shrimp.name: Blotches
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Blotches block. Generates random blotches, based on single feature voronoi cell noise. Jitter controls the voronoi cell noise jittering, generating a less or more evenly distribution of blotches. Offset controls the center offset, a value of 0 generating a hollow blotch, and 1.0 an solid blotch. Radius controls the radius, frequency, the frequency of the blotches.
